Command Line ToolsÂ¶

These command line tools can be accessed through the Windows Command Prompt (see Accessing the Command Prompt on Windows) or from Bash terminal in Linux and MacOSX.

  • headreco
  • mri2mesh
  • dwi2cond
  • simnibs
  • simnibs_gui
  • simnibs_python
  • eeg_positions
  • msh2cortex
  • msh2nii
  • nii2msh
  • mni2subject
  • mni2subject_coords
  • subject2mni
  • subject2mni_coords
  • get_fields_at_coordinates
